home.coverText:
Welcome to the
future and no nonsense
transactions!
home.animation: Myriad is an open source, truly decentralized, digital currency that can be sent peer-to-peer over the internet.

nonsense.title: In todayâ€™s world, there are a lot of coins and a lot of claims. It can be hard to spot whatâ€™s real and whatâ€™s nonsense.

bubbles.instant_transactions: Instant transactions - the difference between transaction and verification

myriadIs.title: But Myriad on the other hand is:

trusted.title:
Trusted, secure and
up-do-date
trusted.body: Myriadcoins unique multi-algoritm approach means that it has extra resistance to 51% attacks.

community.title:
Community-driven with
democratic decision making
community.body: No one and everyone controls Myriad. Itâ€™s a community driven project full of volunteers.

fair.title: Fair distribution and mining
fair.body: Myriadcoin has no pre-mine or IPO and was fairly launched. Myriadcoin uses a long mining period, which prevents a large portion of the coins to be consolidated in the hands of very few.

attacks.title: 51% Attack Resistance
attacks.body: Thanks to our multi algoritm approach.

multi-algo.title: Multi-algoritm
multi-algo.body: SHA256d, Scrypt, Myr-Groestl, Argon2d and Yescrypt.

longblocks.title: Longblocks
longblocks.body: Increased security, less orphans, higher difficulty.

esperanto.title: Saluton!
esperanto.body: Myriad is used to support content creators in the Esperanto community

telegram.title: Got any questions or just wanna chat?

mine.title: How to Mine Myriad

wallet.title: 2. Choose a wallet
wallet.body: Do not store your cryptocurrency on an exchange. You should have awallet ready and setup to store your coins. These wallets support Myriad...

pool.title: 3. Join a mining pool
pool.body: A mining pool is the pooling of resources by miners, who share their processing power over a network.

mine.ready: Now youâ€™re ready to start mining!

need.title: Is there a need for cryptocurrencies?

buy.title: Buy Myriad
buy.body: To get your hands on your first Myriad you need to use an exchange. You can buy Myriad with fiat money or exchange another cryptocurrency for Myriad.
